heading: Our Mission
tagline: We exist to close the gap between strategy and delivery—so your AI investments actually pay off.
description: IntraWeb Technologies exists to own the middle ground between "strategy" and "IT will figure it out." Too many AI pilots die in that gap. We focus on implementation—building systems that actually work in production, not just on paper. We're not trying to scale to hundreds of consultants. We work with a small number of companies so we can deliver real capability and measurable value from their AI and workflow investments.
bullets: 15+ years engineering—building production systems, not prototypes
Deep experience in workflow automation and process integration
SMB focus: based in New Jersey, working with growing companies nationally
Implementation over advice; outcomes over activity; transparency over polish
